prompt.name: helpCoinInstruction
prompt.text: This is your coin balance. You lose 100 coins on answering wrongly. You win 500 coins on answering correctly. You lose 50 coins on opening each door. So, try to open least number of doors possible and identify the greater of the two decimal numbers.

prompt.name: doorClickInstruction
prompt.text: â€ŒDigits of two decimal numbers are hidden behind doors. Click on a door to see the digit behind it. Find the bigger number by opening the least number of doors possible.

prompt.name: selectAnswerInstruction
prompt.text: Compare the two decimals and select the correct answer.

prompt.name: credits
prompt.text: Developed by Mindspark team based on the research by Dr. Kaye Stacey and collaborators, The University of Melbourne, Australia.
